https_chrismaguire_uk_/https_chrismaguir:
Dedicated to serving the community and bringing positive change.
A UK Armed Forces Veteran with 22 years’ service for his country, also with teaching experience in a local school, Chris now serves as a committed leader within Christianity and has experience in charity work.
Embracing traditional Judeo-Christian values that once underpinned our great nation, Chris looks to take a common-sense approach to local politics and to get things done for the local community, not wasting time on things that distract us from the genuine issues the community are dealing with, (such as roads and education issues).
Chris will use his experience in public service, leadership and problem-solving to ensure that the community has their voice heard and their needs addressed, and will promote a patriotic approach to service in our community. Chris is married to Margie, they are residents of the beautiful Oxfordshire village of Harwell along with their daughter Megan.
Family is the cornerstone of any strong and thriving society. It is within the family unit that values, traditions, and a sense of belonging are instilled in future generations. A strong family foundation fosters resilience, compassion, and responsibility, shaping individuals who contribute positively to their communities.
Ensuring the safety and well-being of our children is not just a duty but a moral obligation. Safeguarding their future means creating an environment where they can grow, learn, and prosper without fear or hardship. This requires access to quality education, secure housing, and opportunities that allow them to reach their full potential.
A community is a group of people connected primarily by location. Whilst they may not necessarily share the same values or interests, they support and interact with one another to foster mutual well-being.
As a community, we must work together to support families, ensuring they have the resources and protection needed to raise children in a stable and nurturing environment. Investing in our children’s future is investing in the future of our nation, strengthening the foundations upon which our society is built.
A country is a distinct territorial entity with defined borders, a sovereign government, and a shared national identity, encompassing its people, culture, and institutions.
The best way a person can serve their country is by contributing positively to society, upholding its values, engaging in civic duties, supporting their local community, and striving to make it a better place for future generations.
Britain is a great nation, rich in history, culture, and the arts. Yet, it has been neglected and overrun. Like many of my fellow Reform UK members, I am driven by a deep desire to Make Britain Great Again.
With your vote, you can be confident that I will give my all to serve families, communities, and our country. Great Britain needs Reform, now more than ever.
Now is the time to stand tall, be fearless, and make your voice heard.
Let's show our pride, our passion, and our unwavering commitment to Reform UK.
Change begins with us.
Display your support with confidence and help drive the movement forward.
Show your support by displaying this poster proudly.
Make your voice heard, download and share this poster!

Chris believes in making Britain great again by promoting patriotism, opportunity, and unity for all citizens.
Now is the time to stand tall, be fearless, and make your voice heard.
